// src/App.js import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; function App() { const [showNextSteps, setShowNextSteps] = useState(false); const handleApplyNow = () => { setShowNextSteps(true); }; return (

Welcome to the Job Application Disruption System

Apply to Recommended Jobs

Apply to up to 10 recommended jobs per day with just one click.

{showNextSteps && (

Next Steps

Follow these steps to complete your job applications:

  1. Review the recommended jobs and their descriptions.
  2. Customize your application materials (cover letter, resume, and portfolio) for each job.
  3. Submit your applications through the provided application links.
  4. Keep track of your applications and monitor their progress.
)}

Generate Personalized Application Materials

Let our AI create tailored cover letters, resumes, and portfolios for each job.

Find Your Perfect Match

Discover the best companies and roles based on your skills and preferences.

Get Instant Feedback and Guidance

Receive real-time feedback on your applications, interviews, and offers.

Job Application Disruption System © 2023

); } export default App;
